name: Trace delimiter
description: Groups events by traces an outputs a conforming event log

input.name: collection_input
input.description: Name of the collection that will be used to feed the service

input.name: first
input.description: The value of the start activity of a trace

input.name: last
input.description: The value of the last activity of a trace

input.name: mask
input.description: The topic mask to group same originator events

input.name: collection_output
input.description: Name of the collection were the resulting records will be stored

output.name: json
output.description: JSON conforming to the JXES Event Log standard
